content:
Thanks to all for your feedback, I've made some improvements and added new features. Here's the full list, hope you enjoy them!
## 3.2 - 03/07/22 ___ #### New features - This one has been a top request for quite somet time.... you can now submit your own .icns files directly!! ![Support for icns files](https://api.macosicons.com/uploads/Support_for_icns_files_ec0d205766.jpg) - Added icon reference on submission screen to check icon size. ![Check Size macOSicons.gif](https://api.macosicons.com/uploads/Check_Size_mac_O_Sicons_cbe29a71a6.gif) - User accounts now have a new "Name to show" field, which will be used to display your name, regalrdless of your username. Your username still needs to be unique and will be the main way to identify you. ![name to show.jpg](https://api.macosicons.com/uploads/name_to_show_5595b9cd89.jpg) #### Changes - Started changing some UI icons to those from [IconBrew.com](https://iconbrew.com/) ![iconbrew.com website screenshot](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FNBY6FnWUAIT81v?format=jpg&name=4096x4096) - All usernames have been updated to use #### Bugs bixed - Removed bug where user accounts that don't exist would appear as banned. - Fixed a bug that wouldn't let users edit their icons. - Fixed issue where sometimes the first row of icons would appear taller than the rest. - Added back the Twitter icon button to user profiles. - Fixed issue where some approved icons sometimes wouln't appear at all. - Improvements to the login process.
## 3.1 - 27/01/22: ___ - ‚ù§Ô∏è Save and bookmark your favourite icons ![Save icons and bookmark your favourite macOSicons.com icons](https://media4.giphy.com/media/tL9IxR63fjsTHk9HND/giphy.gif?cid=790b76115f76e1250732dcbaac0149ba9b5d76923bb3dbed&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g) - üîé Quickly jump to search with **cmd + K** ![Use cmd + K to jump to search](https://cdn.kapwing.com/final_61f32c04e915d300635a2093_782530.gif) - üìÜ USA date format available (mm/dd/yyyy) ![USA date format on macOSicons.com](https://media1.giphy.com/media/YQ6ta3HCaDUr4KFJmM/giphy.gif?cid=790b7611af02c476d7bb378e728a124cd5eafd4d7ecf570f&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g) - üöÄ Improved performance - üßë‚Äçüé® Now you can only submit icons if you are the author
announcement: Like macOSicons? You might also like my new project, **[IconBrew.com](https://iconbrew.com/?utm_source=macOSicons&utm_medium=topBanner&utm_campaign=Launch), an open source icon set with hundreds of icons**, with new ones being added weekly. Hope you like it and feel free to reach out [@elrumo](https://twitter.com/elrumo)!!
